Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc26
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc26

Class MainClient

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc26.MainClient
public class MainClient extends Object
Main client class representing a client in the game system. Manages client identification, connection states, server communication, and user interfaces.
